channel.title: Angry Kid gets Angrier
channel.description:
Part 2 of Angry Kid Hates University [ [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,337069.0.html]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,337069.0.html[/url] ]
[code](22:13:25) Burke: yes i do, but school is for 'learning' isnt it? (22:13:57) ollie: correct (22:14:09) Burke: and when i am not 'learning' i.e have no lessons, i go home because there is no point in being there when i am not learning (22:14:26) ollie: have no lessons? surly this must be the end of the day (22:14:35) ollie: as you have lessons throughout the school day (22:14:45) ollie: and a free period is still a lesson (22:15:16) ollie: where you are meant to do individual independent work opposed to class-work (22:15:16) Burke: ollie, shut the fuck up, its not a lesson stop being such a fucking nerd, (22:15:18) ollie: amirite? (22:15:23) ollie: iamrite (22:15:42) Burke: you are not right, there is also comething called homestudy (22:15:55) ollie: which you do not get until second year (22:16:07) ollie: providing you get good grades and have a good standard in school (22:16:09) Burke: if it was wrong, the teachers would notice that i have been leaving school when i sign out for the reason of 'homestudy' (22:16:22) Burke: so why are the teachers not picking up on it? (22:16:28) ollie: which you will not be entitled to due to the fact you go home and play xbox (22:16:30) Burke: are you a teacher? (22:17:18) ollie: good luck in life (22:17:46) Burke: yeah, judging by the way you interpretate 'living' (22:17:51) Burke: you will have a sad life (22:17:58) Burke: so good luck with your sad life[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: 07-01-2009, 16:18:41[/size][hr][code](22:24:16) Burke: nice, just wasted more of your life posting on your runescape website so all your runescape friends can see (22:24:25) Burke: (Y) awsome (22:24:41) Burke: hahaahaha 'part 2' (22:24:51) Burke: u are so gay[/code]

item.title: Angry Kid gets Angrier
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:9, topic:255456”]Um

(22:15:55) ollie: which you do not get until second year
(22:16:07) ollie: providing you get good grades and have a good standard in school

We get it in out first year. We can go home during free periods and if we dont have a lesson in the afternoon, we can go home and stay home at lunchtime.[/quote]

Different schools is different.

Read full topic

Owned, just fucking owned.

item.title: Angry Kid gets Angrier
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

Um

(22:15:55) ollie: which you do not get until second year
(22:16:07) ollie: providing you get good grades and have a good standard in school

We get it in out first year. We can go home during free periods and if we dont have a lesson in the afternoon, we can go home and stay home at lunchtime.

Sorry for caring.

item.title: Angry Kid gets Angrier
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Part 2 of Angry Kid Hates University [ http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,337069.0.html ]

code Burke: yes i do, but school is for ‘learning’ isnt it?
(22:13:57) ollie: correct
(22:14:09) Burke: and when i am not ‘learning’ i.e have no lessons, i go home because there is no point in being there when i am not learning
(22:14:26) ollie: have no lessons? surly this must be the end of the day
(22:14:35) ollie: as you have lessons throughout the school day
(22:14:45) ollie: and a free period is still a lesson
(22:15:16) ollie: where you are meant to do individual independent work opposed to class-work
(22:15:16) Burke: ollie, shut the fuck up, its not a lesson stop being such a fucking nerd,
(22:15:18) ollie: amirite?
(22:15:23) ollie: iamrite
(22:15:42) Burke: you are not right, there is also comething called homestudy
(22:15:55) ollie: which you do not get until second year
(22:16:07) ollie: providing you get good grades and have a good standard in school
(22:16:09) Burke: if it was wrong, the teachers would notice that i have been leaving school when i sign out for the reason of ‘homestudy’
(22:16:22) Burke: so why are the teachers not picking up on it?
(22:16:28) ollie: which you will not be entitled to due to the fact you go home and play xbox
(22:16:30) Burke: are you a teacher?
(22:17:18) ollie: good luck in life
(22:17:46) Burke: yeah, judging by the way you interpretate ‘living’
(22:17:51) Burke: you will have a sad life
(22:17:58) Burke: so good luck with your sad life[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: 07-01-2009, 16:18:41[/size][hr]code Burke: nice, just wasted more of your life posting on your runescape website so all your runescape friends can see
(22:24:25) Burke: (Y) awsome
(22:24:41) Burke: hahaahaha ‘part 2’
(22:24:51) Burke: u are so gay[/code]

Read full topic
